/usr/bin/clang++ -g CMakeFiles/OpenGl_Lab.dir/src/triangle.cpp.o -o OpenGl_Lab  -Wl,-rpath,/home/tami/OpenGl/build/Thirdparty/freeglut/lib /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLU.so Thirdparty/freeglut/lib/libglut.so.3.12.0 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libX11.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libXi.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGL.so -lm
